long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coffee-loving web searchers, rejoice!
Roast New Tab is the search engine for you. Not only does it give you quick access to your favorite search engine, but it also has a background of calming, tasty coffee beans. Now every time you open a new tab, you’ll be transported to a world of warm cups of joe and the sweet taste of victory.

The search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing. However, the extension will not make any changes in your default browser search setting.
Free stock media content is distributed by Unsplash – https://unsplash.com
